Entry.JapaneseText: 溶けない氷
Entry.EnglishText: Everlasting Ice
Entry.Notes: maybe unbreakable ice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>一年前の事故<White>で、幼なじみの<Red>クレア<White>を氷塊に閉じこめてしまった<Red><Veigue><White>。 <Veigue>の必死の努力もむなしく、クレアを覆った氷が溶ける事はなかった。 そんな<Veigue>の前に<Yellow>能力者の二人<White>、<Red><Mao><White>と<Red><Eugene><White>が現れた。 <Mao>の<Yellow>炎のフォルス<White>の力を借り、<Veigue>はクレアを救出した。
Entry.EnglishText: <Yellow>One year ago<White>, <Red><Veigue><White> accidentally trapped his childhood friend <Red>Claire<White> in a block of ice. He desperately attempted to free Claire from her icy prison, but to no avail... <Yellow>A pair of Force users<White>, <Red><Mao><White> and <Red><Eugene><White>, then appeared before <Veigue>. With the help of <Mao>'s <Yellow>Force of Fire<White>, <Veigue> was able to free Claire from the ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バイラス<White>との戦いの後、<Veigue>は<Mao>たちの話を聞くために<Yellow>クレアの家<White>に向かった。
Entry.EnglishText: After battling some <Yellow>Biruses<White>, <Veigue> headed to <Yellow>Claire's House<White> to listen to what <Mao> and his friend had to say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 落日、そして旅立ち
Entry.EnglishText: The Dusk and Departure

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>と<Eugene>は、<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>に始まる<Yellow>異変と陰謀<White>の存在を<Veigue>に告げた。 異変の原因を探り、王国を救うために、仲間になるよう誘う二人だったが、<Veigue>は、その誘いを断る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao> and <Eugene> explain to <Veigue> the <Yellow>strange incidents and conspiracies<White> that began with the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>. The two invite him to join and investigate the cause of these anomolies and save The Kingdom, but <Veigue> refuses.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、それから間もなく、<Yellow>国王直属の能力者部隊・<Blue>王の盾<White>が現れ、<Blue>四星<White>の<Red>サレ<White>と<Red>トーマ<White>によって、クレアはさらわれてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: But shortly thereafter, the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, a <Yellow>group of Force users who report directly to the king<White>, shows up. Claire is kidnapped by two of its members, <Red>Saleh<White> and <Red>Tohma<White> of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを取り戻すため、<Veigue>は旅立つ。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to get Claire back, <Veigue> embarks on a journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒トリオあらわる!!
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Trio

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>を追い、<Yellow>ミナール<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and his party pursue the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> to <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 先を急ぐ三人の前に、自らを<Red>漆黒の翼<White>と名乗る<Yellow>おかしな三人組<Red>（ギンナル・ドルンブ・ユシア）<White>が立ちはだかった。 <Veigue>たちは、漆黒の翼を軽くひとひねりにし、先を急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: But barring the party's chase is an <Yellow>odd trio<White> <Red>(Ginnar, Yucia, and Drombe)<White> who call themselves the <Red>Dark Wings<White>. <Veigue> and the party give them a quick beatdown before hurrying on ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: 暗殺者のメロディ
Entry.EnglishText: Assassin's Melody
Entry.Notes: Need to shorten

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは再び<Yellow>ミナール<White>に向かって<Yellow>ケケット街道<White>を進む。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party continue through the <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White> towards <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 三人は途中の小屋で休む事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: The three decide to rest at a hostel.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで突然、宿屋の主人におそわれる。
Entry.EnglishText: But suddenly, the innkeeper assaults them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 小屋の人々は<Blue>王の盾・四星<White>の一人、<Red>ワルトゥ<White>の<Yellow>音のフォルス<White>で操られていた。 <Veigue>は、<Yellow>暗示を解くカギとなる音<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The people in the hostel are being hypnotized by <Red>Walto<White>, user of the <Yellow>Force of Sound<White> and one of the <Blue>Four Stars<White> of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. <Veigue> searches for the <Yellow>sound that acts as the key to breaking the hypnotism<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々を救った三人に、敵が近づく。
Entry.EnglishText: As the people are freed, an enemy approaches.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちの前に現れたワルトゥは、国を案じ、<Eugene>の軍への復職を求めるが、<Eugene>は応じない。 ワルトゥは説得を諦め去って行く。 <Eugene>が起こした<Yellow>あの事件<White>という、<Yellow>謎の言葉<White>を残して……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto appears before <Veigue> and the party, Out of concern for his country, he beseeches <Eugene> to rejoin the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, but <Eugene> refuses. Walto gives up on bringing him back and leaves behind some <Yellow>mysterious words<White> that imply an <Yellow>incident<White> <Eugene> was involved in...

Entry.JapaneseText: エトレー橋の決戦!!
Entry.EnglishText: Battle on Etoray Bridge!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミナール<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たちは、 <Yellow>ケケット街道<White>を<Red>南<White>へとひた走る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Minal<White> by taking the <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White> <Red>south<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>エトレー橋<White>を渡ろうとすると、笑い声と共に、漆黒トリオが現れる。 <Red>漆黒の牙<White>と名を変えた三人は、<Veigue>たちを足止めしようと、<Yellow>エトレー橋<White>を破壊してしまった！ 漆黒の牙を一蹴した<Veigue>たちだったが、橋は通行不可能となり、<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈<White>へと大きく迂回する事を余儀なくされてしまう……
Entry.EnglishText: As they try to cross the <Yellow>Etoray Bridge<White>, the Dark Trio appears wtih a roar of laughter. The three, who have renamed their group to the <Red>Dark Fangs<White>, destroy the bridge to stall <Veigue> and the party! <Veigue> and the party defeat the Dark Fangs, but the bridge has now become unpassable. They are forced to take a significant detour through the <Yellow>Alvan Mountains<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈を越えろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: The Alvan Mountains
Entry.Notes: Shorten to fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party traverse through the <Yellow>Alvan Mountains<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで三人を待っていたのは、<Yellow>荒れ放題の山道<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: In these mountains, what awaits the three are <Yellow>rugged mountain paths<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使い、険しい道を進んで行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party use their Force to advance through this rugged road.

Entry.JapaneseText: 様々な困難を乗り越え、旅を続ける間に<Veigue>は徐々に、<Eugene>と<Mao>に心を開き始めていた……
Entry.EnglishText: As they overcome the various challenges in their journey, <Veigue> begins to open up to <Eugene> and <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 雨の復讐
Entry.EnglishText: Revenge in the Rain

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミナール平野<White>を横切り、<Yellow>ミナール<White>へと向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: The party cross <Yellow>Minal Plains<White> to reach <Yellow>Minal<White>.
Entry.Notes: Shorten a bit to fit in the box

Entry.JapaneseText: 突然の異常気象に見舞われた三人は 雪の中を進む。
Entry.EnglishText: They are suddenly hit with extreme weather and have to traverse through rain and snow.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>天候の迷宮<White>に陥った三人は、それがフォルスによるものだと考え、敵を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The three are trapped in a <Yellow>maze created by the weather<White>. Suspecting it to be caused by Force, they search for the enemy.

Entry.JapaneseText: 敵のフォルスを打ち破った三人の前に、 <Yellow>雨のフォルス<White>を持つ能力者、<Red><Annie>・バース<White>が現れた。 <Yellow>彼女の父<Red>ドクター・バース<White>は、<Eugene>の<Cyan>親友<White>でありながら、<Eugene>に<Cyan>殺された男<White>だった。 復讐に燃える<Annie>と戦い、倒す<Veigue>たちだが、<Eugene>は親友の娘を放ってはおけない。 傷つき衰弱した<Annie>を救うため医者を求め、三人は<Yellow>ミナール<White>へ急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: As the three destroy the trap created by the enemy's Force, <Red>Annie Barrs<White>, user of the <Yellow>Force of Rain<White>, reveals herself before them. <Yellow>Her father, <Red>Doctor Barrs<White>, was a <Cyan>close friend<White> of <Eugene>'s, but <Eugene> had <Cyan>murdered him<White>. Bent on revenge, Annie confronts them, but <Veigue> and the party triumph. Despite being attacked, <Eugene> cannot leave his friend's daughter alone. Seeking a doctor to save <Annie>, who was wounded and fading, the three rush to <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 港町ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Harbor Town Minal
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の命に別状がないと知った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>首都バルカ<White>へ渡る船を求める。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon hearing that Annie survived the worst of her wounds, <Veigue> and the party seek a ship to cross to <Yellow>Balka: The Capital City<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、港は軍によって封鎖されていた。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the military blockades the port.

Entry.JapaneseText: 三人は船を求めて奔走する。
Entry.EnglishText: The three scramble to find a boat.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、結局行き詰まり、協力者を探す事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: In the end, they hit an impasse and seek out a collaborator to smuggle them in.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>医師キュリア<White>から、クレアの伝言を聞かされた三人は、<Blue>王の盾<White>が陸路を進んでいると知る。 その時、目覚めた<Annie>の心ない言葉が<Red>ミーシャ<White>を傷つけてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: When <Red>Doctor Curia<White> informs them of the message Claire left behind, the three learn that the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> is actually traveling by land. At that moment, <Annie> wakes up, her insensitive words hurt <Red>Misha<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>牙のフォルス<White>を暴走させてしまったミーシャを救う<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party save Misha, whose <Yellow>Force of Fang<White> has gone berserk.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の言動に戸惑う<Annie>だったが、事件の真相を知るため、<Veigue>たちと行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie> is perplexed by <Eugene>'s actions and words, but decides to join the party to discover the truth behind her father's death.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>を加え四人となった一行は、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: With <Annie>, the party now makes four. They decide to head to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>迷いの森<White>へと足を踏み入れる。 <Annie>のアドバイスのもと、<Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使って迷宮を進んで行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party enter the <Yellow>Forest Labyrinth<White>. Following <Annie>'s advice, <Veigue> and the party use their Force to make their way through the labyrinth.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に迷いの森を抜けた四人の前方に、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へと続く道があった。
Entry.EnglishText: For the four who traversed the forest successfully, there lies a path leading straight to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 怒りのジャングル
Entry.EnglishText: Rage of the Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>を追って<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>に来た<Veigue>たちは、街の空気に異変を察し、様子をうかがう事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: After pursuing the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>, <Veigue> and the party notice the strange atmosphere in the town and decide to scope out the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>密林化した製鉄工場<White>に<Yellow>強いフォルス<White>を感じた四人は、状況を探る。
Entry.EnglishText: The four feel a <Yellow>powerful Force<White> coming from the <Red>Steelworks that was overrun by plant life<White> and investigate the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに現れたサレたちは、ヒューマの娘<Red>セレーナ<White>をさらおうとしていた。 目前で姉を奪われた怒りと哀しみで、<Yellow>樹のフォルス<White>を暴走させてしまった セレーナの弟<Red><Tytree><White>を救うため、 <Veigue>たちは工場の中へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh and his men had showed up there and tried to kidnap a Huma girl - <Red>Selena<White>. Her brother, <Red><Tytree><White>, lost control of his Force from his anger and sorrow at having his sister taken away, so <Veigue> and the party head into the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスに満ちた工場の中、<Tytree>を探す四人。
Entry.EnglishText: The four search for <Tytree> in the factory that is overrun with Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちに暴走を鎮められ、正気に戻った<Tytree>は、姉を救うため、四人と共に行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: After <Veigue> and the party quell his outburst, <Tytree> comes to his sense and decides to join the party on their journey to save his sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: 熱い男が仲間になった。
Entry.EnglishText: A hot-blooded fellow had joined the team.

Entry.JapaneseText: 裏切りの食卓
Entry.EnglishText: A Treacherous Meal

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>サニイタウン<White>を目指し、<Yellow>トヨホウス河<White>を下る事にした<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party decide to take the <Yellow>Toyohose River<White> down to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、河下りの舟は壊れていた。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the raft was broken.

Entry.JapaneseText: 五人は、舟の修理に使う<Yellow>木材を集め<White>つつ<Yellow>キノコ狩り<White>をする事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: The five decide to <Yellow>forage for mushrooms<White> while <Yellow>collecting wood<White> to repair the raft.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへ<Red>謎の男<White>が現れ、<Tytree>に<Veigue>たちの毒殺と引き換えに、姉セレーナを返すと取引をもちかける。
Entry.EnglishText: During their collecting, a <Red>mysterious man<White> appears before <Tytree> and offers him a deal to return his sister Selena in exchange for poisoning <Veigue> and the others.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何事もなかったかのように食事が始まり、五人が<Tytree>自慢のキノコ料理を食べていた時、敵が現れた。
Entry.EnglishText: The meal began rather uneventfully, with the five enjoying <Tytree>'s signature mushroom dish, when suddenly the enemy showed up.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毒の症状に苦しみながらも敵を倒すが、<Tytree>に対する疑惑が残る。 結局、<Tytree>が料理に使ったのが、<Red>バクショウダケ<White>という<Red>毒キノコ<White>だと判明し、疑惑は晴れる。
Entry.EnglishText: Although the party was suffering from the poison, they emerge victorious, but suspect <Tytree>. It turns out, <Tytree> had accidentally used a <Red>poisonous mushroom<White> known as <Red>Funny Fungus<White>, and so their suspicions were cleared.

Entry.JapaneseText: 激流!! トヨホウス河
Entry.EnglishText: Down Tohoyose River!
Entry.Notes: Need to shorten

Entry.JapaneseText: 修理が終わった河下り便の舟で、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: Using the repaired raft, <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 激流を乗り越え、無事<Yellow>トヨホウス河<White>を下りきった<Veigue>たちの前方に、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>が見えて来た。
Entry.EnglishText: Overcoming the rapids and safely descending the <Yellow>Toyohose River<White>, <Veigue> and the party finally see <Yellow>Sunnytown<White> ahead of them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 哀しき雷鳴
Entry.EnglishText: Sorrowful Thunder

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>に到着した<Veigue>たちは港へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Having arrived safely at <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>, <Veigue> and the party head for the harbor.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、この港も軍が封鎖していた。 五人は街で<Blue>王の盾<White>の情報を集める。
Entry.EnglishText: Sadly, this port too was blockaded. The five search for info on the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> in the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 娘をさらわれたという母親の話から、<Blue>王の盾<White>の足取りをつかんだ五人は、 <Yellow>テルアラ街道<White>を西へ進む。
Entry.EnglishText: Hearing from a mother about how her daughter was kidnapped, the five continue their pursuit of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. They proceed westward along the <Yellow>Tel'alla Highroad<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Blue>王の盾<White>から逃げて来た娘、<Red><Hilda><White>と出会う。 <Hilda>を守るため、五人は追っ手を迎え撃つ。
Entry.EnglishText: The party find <Red><Hilda><White>, a girl who managed to escaped the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. In order to protect <Hilda>, the five confront her pursuers.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、<Hilda>は<Yellow>敵の刺客<White>だった。 トーマによって<Red>ハーフ<White>だと暴露され、怒りのあまり暴走した<Hilda>と戦い暴走を鎮める<Veigue>たち。 傷ついた<Hilda>の手当てをするため、五人は<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>へと戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: However, it turns out that <Hilda> was actually an enemy assassin. When Tohma reveals that <Hilda> is a <Red>Half<White>, she goes berserk, forcing <Veigue> and the party to fight her to quell her outburst. The five then return to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White> to tend to <Hilda>'s wounds.

Entry.JapaneseText: 光の追跡者
Entry.EnglishText: Pursuing the Light

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>を宿屋で休ませ、今後の進路を検討する<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: After taking <Hilda> to the inn to rest, <Veigue> and the party deliberate on their next course of action.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに<Blue>四星<White>の一員で<Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>を持つ能力者、<Red>ミリッツァ<White>が現れる。 ミリッツァに狙われたヒューマの娘を救うべく、五人は戦いを挑む。
Entry.EnglishText: But out of the blue comes <Red>Militsa<White>, a member of the <Blue>Four Stars<White> and user of the <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>. The five fight her to save a Huma girl, who is being targeted.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>攻略のカギが<Yellow>光<White>だと考えた<Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使って光を遮り、ミリッツァと戦う。
Entry.EnglishText: Believing that <Yellow>Light<White> is the key to countering the <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>, <Veigue> and the party use their Force to block the light and battle Militsa.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに現れた<Hilda>と共に戦い、ミリッツァを倒す<Veigue>たち。 トーマへの復讐のため、<Hilda>は五人と共に行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: With <Hilda> fighting alongside them, <Veigue> and the party are able to defeat Militsa. Desiring to take revenge on Tohma, <Hilda> decides to join the five on their journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Queen Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァが狙っていたヒューマの娘を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party search for the Huma girl Militsa was after.

Entry.JapaneseText: その娘<Red>スージー<White>は、<Yellow>ベルサス<White>という街で<Blue>王の盾<White>にさらわれた後、<Yellow>カレギア城<White>に送られ、そこから逃げて来たと話す。 スージーの話から、さらわれた娘たちは丁重な扱いを受けていると判明するが、<Red>アガーテ女王<White>がヒューマの娘たちを集める理由はわからないままだった。
Entry.EnglishText: <Red>Susie<White> informs the party that she had been kidnapped by the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> in Belsas and sent to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, where she had escaped from. Susie's story reveals that the kidnapped girls had been treated with respect, but the reason <Red>Queen Agarte<White> gathered so many Huma girls was still a mystery.

Entry.JapaneseText: その矢先、<Yellow>首都バルカ<White>でアガーテ女王のお披露目の儀の開催が発表される。 ヒューマの娘たちの誘拐と関連があると感じ、不安を覚えた<Veigue>たちは先を急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: At that moment, an announcement was made - there would be a ceremony to celebrate the coronation of Queen Agarte in the Capital City of <Yellow>Balka<White>. Sensing a connection to the various abductions of Huma girls, <Veigue> and the party hasten to the capital city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一方、クレアは、<Veigue>を信じ、孤独な戦いを続けていた……
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Claire puts her trust in <Veigue> and continues to fight her own battle...

Entry.JapaneseText: クロダダク砂漠を行け
Entry.EnglishText: To Kurodadaku Desert
Entry.Notes: Shorten to fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バビログラード<White>を目指し、<Yellow>クロダダク砂漠<White>を<Red>南<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head <Red>south<White> through the <Yellow>Kurodadaku Desert<White> to reach <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が古井戸に落ち、偶然、<Yellow>カレーズ（地下水路）<White>が見つかる。 <Veigue>たちは砂漠の酷暑を避け、<Yellow>カレーズ<White>を進む事にする。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> ends up falling into an old well and accidentally discovers an <Yellow>underground waterway<White> known as <Yellow>Karez<White>. <Veigue> and the party decide to take <Yellow>Karez<White> to avoid the extreme heat of the desert.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷路のように入り組んだ地下水路には、行く手をはばむ岩石やバイラス、水流など、数々の困難が待ち受けていた。 <Veigue>たちは力を合わせて進む。
Entry.EnglishText: This labyrinth of an underground waterway is filled with boulders, Biruses, water currents, and other obstacles. By working together, <Veigue> and the party are able to advance through these obstacles.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に<Yellow>カレーズ<White>を抜け地上に出た時、<Annie>が高熱を出し、倒れる。 手当てをするため、一行は近くの村、<Yellow>アニカマル<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party is able to safely exit <Yellow>Karez<White> and reach the surface, but <Annie> develops a high fever and collapses. In order to treat her, the party heads to a nearby village known as <Yellow>Anikamal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマルの冒険家
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal Adventurer

Entry.JapaneseText: 病に倒れた<Annie>のため、医者を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for a doctor to treat <Annie> who has fallen ill.

Entry.JapaneseText: 村人はよそ者に冷たく、医者もいない。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, the villagers act coldy to any strangers and there are no doctors around.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな中、<Red>冒険家フランツ<White>と出会う。
Entry.EnglishText: While searching, they encounter <Red>Frantz<White>, an <Red>adventurer<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツは、<Annie>が<Yellow>死の伝染病デスガロ熱<White>に感染していると告げる。 <Annie>の命が危ない。
Entry.EnglishText: Frantz informs the party that <Annie> is infected with a <Yellow>lethal illness<White> known as <Yellow>Deathgaro Fever<White>. <Annie>'s life's in grave danger.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、その治療には<Yellow>幻のバイラス・<Red>リブガロの角<White>が必要だった。 <Veigue>たちは、リブガロ発見の望みを託し、近くの<Yellow>オアシス<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, the only cure requires the horns of the <Red>Birus of Illusion<White>, the Livgaro. <Veigue> and the party head to the nearby <Yellow>oasis<White>, hoping to encounter the Livgaro.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>リブガロの角から作られた薬<White>によって、<Annie>は事なきを得た。 フランツとの別れを惜しみつつ、<Veigue>たちは、再び<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie> is saved by the <Yellow>medicine made from the horns of the Livgaro<White>. Saying farewell to Frantz, <Veigue> and the party continue on to <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 登山洞の攻防
Entry.EnglishText: Climbers' Cavern Battle
Entry.Notes: Shorten to fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バビログラード<White>のある<Yellow>南大陸<White>を目指す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to the <Yellow>southern part of the continent<White> where <Yellow>Babilograd<White> is located.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>登山洞<White>から山の上の街へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: To reach the town, they need to pass through <Yellow>Climbers' Cavern<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: その途中、改名した<Red>漆黒の爪<White>が現れる。 <Annie>はケガをしたギンナルの手当てをする。 ギンナルは<Cyan>「借りは返す」<White>と言い残し去って行く。
Entry.EnglishText: On the way, they encounter the rebranded <Red>Dark Claws<White>. Annie treats Ginnar's leg injury and Ginnar leaves, saying that he would <Cyan>return the favor<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに<Blue>王の盾<White>の能力者<Red>ドネル<White>が現れ、<Veigue>たちに襲いかかる。 <Yellow>土のフォルス<White>を打ち破り、ドネルを 倒した六人だったが、<Yellow>落石<White>が発生し、足止めされてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: A bit later, <Red>Donel<White> of the Royal Shield appears and attacks <Veigue> and the party. The six are able to defeat Donel's <Yellow>Force of Earth<White>, but he drops some boulders, blocking the party's path.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の<Yellow>鋼のフォルス<White>で岩石を破壊し足止めを突破した六人は<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: Using <Eugene>'s <Yellow>Force of Steel<White>, the party breaks the boulders and hurries onward to <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 禁じられた街
Entry.EnglishText: The Forbidden City

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Blue>王の盾<White>の情報を求め、<Yellow>バビログラード<White>を回る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party scout out <Yellow>Babilograd<White> in search of information on the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>が街の人々を使い、娘たちを港へ連れて行った事をつきとめる六人。 しかし、山頂と港をつなぐ<Yellow>蒸気リフト<White>の管理人はワルトゥの<Yellow>音のフォルス<White>で操られ、リフトは動かない。
Entry.EnglishText: They learn that the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> has used the townsfolk to take the girls to the harbor. However, the Lift Operator has been hypnotized by Walto's <Yellow>Force of Sound<White>, and they are unable to use the lift.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>暗示を解く言葉<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for the <Yellow>key words that can break the hypnotism<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥの二重トリックを破り、港に降りた六人は、<Blue>王の盾<White>を追う。
Entry.EnglishText: After breaking Walto's two-fold hypnotism, the six take the lift down to the harbor and pursue the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥとミリッツァを退け、娘たちを救い出す<Veigue>たち。 <Tytree>はセレーナと再会するが、クレアはすでに<Yellow>バルカ<White>へ連れて行かれた後だった……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party fight Walto and Militsa and rescue the girls. <Tytree> is reunited with his sister Selena, but Claire has already been taken to <Yellow>Balka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: The Capital City: Balka
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>首都バルカ<White>へ急ぐ<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: The party rushes to the <Yellow>Capital City: Balka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不気味にそびえる<Yellow>カレギア城<White>の前で、<Veigue>はクレアを想う……
Entry.EnglishText: Standing in front of the imposing <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, <Veigue> thinks of Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: その頃、城内の女王の間ではクレアとアガーテが対面していた。 クレアとの接見を終えたアガーテは、<Cyan>「クレアがわたくしを救ってくれる」<White>と言う。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Claire and Agarte meet in the Queen's room. After their meeting, Agarte declares that <Cyan>Claire will be her "salvation"<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 城への潜入を計る<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: The party attempts to infiltrate the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>情報屋ヨッツア<White>から<Red>ジベール<White>を紹介される。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Red>informant Yotza<White> introduces them to <Red>Gibert<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールは情報と交換に、<Red>ハック<White>の 安否を確かめるよう求める。 <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>へ。
Entry.EnglishText: In exchange for information to infiltrate the castle, Gibert requests the party to confirm the safety of <Red>Hack<White>, a subordinate of his. <Veigue> and the party head over to <Yellow>Mesechina Caverns<White> to check up on Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスに襲われていたハックを救う。
Entry.EnglishText: The party saves Hack from a Birus attack.

Entry.JapaneseText: 約束を果たした<Veigue>たちに、ジベールは城への潜入方法を教える。
Entry.EnglishText: Having fulfilled their end of the bargain, Gibert informs <Veigue> and the party on how to infiltrate the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なる王
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred King

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールに教えられた<Yellow>地下道<White>から、城への潜入を試みる<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party sneak into the castle through the <Yellow>underground passage<White> that Gibert revealed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王族の脱出用に作られたという通路には、侵入者を防ぐための様々な仕掛けが施されていた。
Entry.EnglishText: The passage, said to have been built as an escape route for the royal family, is equipped with several devices to ward off intruders.

Entry.JapaneseText: 潜入に成功した六人は、クレアや他の娘たちを探す。
Entry.EnglishText: After successfully infiltrating the castle, the six search for Claire and the other girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: サレに見つかり、一触即発の場へ女王アガーテが現れる。 謁見を許された六人は、アガーテが、カレギア王国を救うために、<Red>聖なる王復活の儀式<White>を執り行おうとしているのだと聞かされる。 クレアを返すよう訴える<Veigue>の声は、アガーテの耳には届かない。 そして、女王の怒りを買った六人は、捕らえられてしまう……
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh discovers them, but Queen Agarte shows up just as they are about to fight. The six are granted an audience and Agarte informs them that she will perform a <Red>ritual to resurrect the Sacred King<White> in order to save The Kingdom of Callegea. <Veigue> begs her to return Claire, but his request falls on deaf ears. The six, having incurred the Queen's wrath, are struck down and captured.

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒の地下牢
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Dungeon

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>能力者収容所<White>に囚われた<Veigue>たちの前に、<Red>漆黒の鍵<White>が現れる。 「登山洞での借りを返す」と告げ、 ギンナルは<Veigue>を助け出すと、 カギとメモを置いて去って行く。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Red>Dark Keys<White> appear before <Veigue> and the party, who are trapped in a <Yellow>prison built for Force users<White>. Ginnar, holding true to his word to return the favor, breaks <Veigue> out and leaves him with a key and a memo.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>は、ギンナルのメモを頼りに、牢に仕掛けられた<Yellow>フォルス無効化装置<White>を解除し、仲間たちを救い出す。 <Red>聖なる王復活の儀式<White>の開始まで、残された時間は少ない。 儀式を阻止し、クレアを救うため、<Veigue>たち六人は、<Yellow>カレギア城<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: Using the instructions written on the memo, <Veigue> disables the <Yellow>Force suppression device<White> in the prison and rescues his friends. There is little time before the <Red>ritual to resurrect the Sacred King<White> begins. To stop the ritual and save Claire, <Veigue> and the party rush to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由
Entry.EnglishText: Motive

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>カレギア城<White>に戻った<Veigue>たちは、クレアを捜す。
Entry.EnglishText: Having returned to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, <Veigue> and the party search for Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、クレアは儀式のため、すでに連れられて行った後だった。 六人は城の屋上にある<Yellow>祭儀場<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: However, Claire has already been taken away for the ritual. The six head to the <Yellow>Ritual Dais<White> on the roof of the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: その行く手に、サレとトーマが立ちはだかる。 <Veigue>たちはサレとトーマを倒し、<Yellow>祭儀場<White>へと急ぐ。 戦いに敗れたサレの憎しみの言葉が、城内にむなしく響く……
Entry.EnglishText: Blocking their path stands Saleh and Tohma. <Veigue> and the party defeat Saleh and Tohma, hurrying on to the <Yellow>Ritual Dais<White>. Saleh, having been bested in battle, swears vengence against the party, his words echoing in vain through the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 満月
Entry.EnglishText: Full Moon

Entry.JapaneseText: 厳戒態勢の城内を駆け抜け、<Yellow>祭儀場<White>にたどり着く<Veigue>。 しかし、その目前で儀式は執り行われ、女王アガーテは<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を使い、 <Yellow>聖なる王の力<White>を手に入れる。 だが、アガーテの身体に異変が起こり、美しきガジュマの女王は黒く猛々しい、<Red>聖獣王ゲオルギアス<White>へと変化を遂げる。 ゲオルギアスは<Cyan>ヒューマせん滅<White>を唱え、<Veigue>たちに襲いかかる。 激しい戦いの末、<Veigue>たちに倒された<Yellow>聖獣王<White>は大爆発を起こし、クレアとアガーテはその爆発に飲み込まれる。 <Veigue>は閃光と爆風の中、ついにクレアを救い出す。
Entry.EnglishText: Even with the castle's heightened security, <Veigue> reaches the <Yellow>ritual dais<White>. However, Queen Agarte is able to perform the ritual before their very eyes, using her <Yellow>Force of Moon<White> to obtain the <Yellow>Sacred King's Power<White>. However, something strange happens to Agarte's body, and the beautiful Queen of the Gajuma transforms into <Red>Geyorkias, King of the Sacred Beasts<White>. Geyorkias declares that <Cyan>all Huma will be destroyed<White> and attacks <Veigue> and the party. After a fierce battle, <Veigue> and the party defeat the <Yellow>Sacred King<White>, whose defeat causes an explosion that envelops both Claire and Agarte. <Veigue> heads into the blast and is finally able to rescue Claire.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if I should use explosion or another way to phrase this

Entry.JapaneseText: 目覚め
Entry.EnglishText: Awakening

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>スールズ<White>に戻った<Veigue>とクレア。 儀式以来、眠り続けていたクレアが、ようやく目を覚ました。 だが喜びも束の間、村で騒ぎが起こる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and Claire are back in <Yellow>Sulz<White>. Claire, who has been unconscious ever since the ritual, has finally awoken. However, their joy is short-lived as a commotion breaks out in the village.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ポプラおばさん<White>の種族差別的な発言をきっかけに、争いを始める人々。 それを鎮めたのは<Annie>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: The villagers start fighting amongst themselves after <Red>Aunt Poplar<White> makes some discriminatory remarks. <Annie> appears and defuses the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の話によれば、今、<White>世界規模の異変<White>が起こっており、その異変は<Eugene>の身にも影響を及ぼしているという。 <Veigue>は<Eugene>を救うため旅立つ決意をする。
Entry.EnglishText: According to <Annie>, there is a worldwide phenomena that is affecting <Eugene> too. <Veigue> decides to journey once more to save <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人は<Tytree>の協力を得るべく、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: The two of them head over to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White> to recruit <Tytree>'s help.

Entry.JapaneseText: 奇妙な再会
Entry.EnglishText: A Strange Reunion

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ケケット街道の小屋<White>で休みを取る<Veigue>と<Annie>。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and <Annie> take a break in the hostel on <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへ、クレアがやって来る。 まだ本調子ではないクレアを心配する<Veigue>だったが、クレアの意思は固く、三人で<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へ向かう事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: At that moment, Claire appears. <Veigue> is worried that Claire is still not in good enough shape to journey with them, but she is adamant, so the three head to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White> together.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>で<Tytree>と再会する<Veigue>たち。 <Tytree>はバルカ行きを快諾し、四人は<Eugene>たちの待つ<Yellow>バルカのメセチナ洞窟<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party reunite with <Tytree> at <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>. <Tytree> is quick to offer his help, and the four of them hurry to <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White> near <Yellow>Balka<White>, where <Eugene> and the others are waiting.

Entry.JapaneseText: 洞窟では、<Mao>が<Veigue>たちを待ちわびていた。
Entry.EnglishText: Inside the cavern, <Mao> waits for <Veigue> and the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: 震える牙
Entry.EnglishText: Quivering Fangs

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>で<Veigue>たちが見たのは、ヒューマへの憎悪にとらわれ怒り猛る<Eugene>の姿だった。 <Eugene>を救う<Yellow>秘薬<White>を求めて、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: In the <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>, <Veigue> and the party see <Eugene> possessed by hatred towards Huma. Seeking a <Yellow>medicine<White> that could save <Eugene>, <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Razilda<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 秘薬を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party search for the medicine.

Entry.JapaneseText: その途中、<Hilda>と再会する。
Entry.EnglishText: Along the way, they encounter <Hilda> again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前、<Yellow>収容所<White>で助けた<Red>イゴル<White>の計らいで<Yellow>鎮魂錠<White>を手に入れた四人は、急いで<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>へ戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: After obtaining the <Yellow>Requiem Pastille<White> with the help of <Red>Igor<White>, whom they had saved back in the <Yellow>prison<White>, the four rush back to <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ヒューマへの憎悪に支配され暴走を始めた<Eugene>は、<Veigue>たちに襲い掛かる。 <Veigue>たちに暴走を鎮められ、鎮魂錠を飲んだ<Eugene>は、ようやく冷静さを取り戻した。
Entry.EnglishText: However, <Eugene> was overwhelmed by his hatred towards the Huma and goes berserk, attacking <Veigue> and the party. <Eugene> is finally able to regain his senses once <Veigue> quells his outburst and has him drink the Requiem Pastille.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なる戦い
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred War

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>異変の原因<White>が<Yellow>ゲオルギアス<White>ではないかと考えた<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>に手がかりを求める。
Entry.EnglishText: Surmising that the cause of these anomolies lies in <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>, <Veigue> and the party search the area for clues.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、洞窟の奥に<Red>遺跡<White>を発見する。 <Yellow>石碑<White>には、<Red>聖なる戦い<White>と呼ばれる古の争いを伝える碑文が刻まれていた。 <Cyan>「<Red>思念<Cyan>が世界に散り、人々を憎しみ合わせている。聖者の力で思念を消せば争いを止められる」<White>と、<Veigue>たちは考える。
Entry.EnglishText: The party discovered some <Red>ruins<White> at the back of the cavern. Inscribed on the <Yellow>steles<White> was a record of an ancient conflict known as the <Red>Sacred War<White>. The <Red>Will<White> was spread throughout the world, inciting hatred among mankind<White>. <Veigue> and the party conclude that the <Cyan>Power of the Saints could purify the Will<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 石碑に描かれた<Red>紋章のような印<White>を見た、という<Hilda>の言葉をたよりに、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>へ向かい、 手がかりを探す事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda> recognizes the <Red>crest<White> on the stele, which leads <Veigue> and the party to head to <Yellow>Razilda<White> to search for clues on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの旗の下に
Entry.EnglishText: The Flag of Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>の街をめぐり、<Yellow>石碑の紋章<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party travels to the city of <Yellow>Razilda<White>, looking for the crest that was on the <Yellow>stele<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ラジルダの旗<White>と<Yellow>紋章<White>の関連性に着目した六人は、さらに調査を続ける。
Entry.EnglishText: Noticing the connection between the <Red>Razildan Flag<White> and the <Yellow>crest<White>, they continue investigating.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、紋章が<Blue>闇の力<White>と呼ばれる<Yellow>古代の聖者の力<White>を表している事がわかる。 カギを握るのは<Red>旗<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: They learned the crest represented the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>, which was <Yellow>one of the ancient saints' powers<White>. Within the <Red>two<White> flags was the key.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if I correctly translated this one

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<Yellow>が眠るという泉<White>、泉の場所を示す地図、泉を開くというカギ、<Yellow>ふたつ<White>の種族に伝わる<Yellow>ふたつ<White>の旗と紋章……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>spring<White> where the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> is said to slumber, a map showing the location of the spring, a key to open the fountain, <Yellow>two<White> flags and emblems passed down the <Yellow>two<White> tribes...
Entry.Notes: Needs a translation check; also not sure if I should use slumber or lie, or something else

Entry.JapaneseText: すべてが<Yellow>ひとつ<White>になった時、六人は、石碑の紋章を見つけ、<Blue>闇の力<Yellow>が眠るという泉<White>の手がかりを得る。
Entry.EnglishText: When all of these are combined into <Yellow>one<White>, the six discover a crest like the one on the stele. This crest holds a clue to the <Yellow>location of the spring<White> where the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> lies.

Entry.JapaneseText: 四季の花が咲く不思議な泉のほとりで、<Cyan>ラジルダに伝わる古の詩<White>を歌った時、<Veigue>たちの目の前に、<Red>古代の遺跡<White>が姿を現した……
Entry.EnglishText: After reciting an <Cyan>ancient poem from Razilda<White> by the springs, the <Red>ancient ruins<White> surfaced.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if "surfaced" is the right word to use, need to see the actual scene take place

Entry.JapaneseText: 鏡の国の<Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s Land of Mirrors
Entry.Notes: Since this is hsi trial, reflection might make more sense?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>泉の底から現れた遺跡<White>へと乗り込んだ<Veigue>たち。 力を求める<Tytree>に、<Blue>闇の力<White>の主は、信じるものを示せと言う。
Entry.EnglishText: The party enters the <Yellow>ruins that have emerged from the spring<White>. Seeking the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>, <Tytree> is challenged by the Saint to demonstrate the strength of his beliefs.
Entry.Notes: I used Saint here rather than master because the script refers to them as Saints at this moment (before they are revealed as Sacred Beasts).

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は、目の前で繰り広げられる事件に激しく心を揺さぶれながらも、<Red>ひとつの答<White>にたどり着く。 ひとりとして自分と同じヒトはいない。 ヒトの数だけ種族があるようなものだ。 でも、ヒトがヒトとして感じる<Yellow>気持ち<White>は、みんな<Cyan>同じ<White>はずだ……と。
Entry.EnglishText: Although agitated by the various events shown before his eyes, <Tytree> is able to come to a singular conclusion: That there are no Human beings that are the same. There are as many "races" as there are Humans. But the <Yellow>feelings<White> that all Human beings face are the <Cyan>same<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は<Blue>闇の力<White>、すなわち<Red>聖獣イーフォン<White>との戦いに打ち勝つ事で決意を示し、<Blue>闇の力<White>を手に入れる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> demonstrates the conviction in his words by besting the <Red>Sacred Beast, Eephon<White>, and obtains the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>.
Entry.Notes: Technically I think it's overcoming the Power of Shade from the Sacred Beast Eephon, but it sounds a bit clunky and I'm not entirely sure that's exactly what happens based on the script

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Blue>思念<White>の<Blue>浄化<White>のため、次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求め、<Red>ピピスタ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to <Red>Pipista<White> in search of the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White> in order to <Blue>purify<White> the <Blue>Will<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタの灯
Entry.EnglishText: Lights of Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: 次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求めて、ピピスタに来た<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party arrive at Pipista in search of the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこは、<Yellow>ガジュマの村<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: It was located in a <Yellow>Gajuma village<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックが捕らえられた一件を通じて、<Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>が眠るという<Blue>聖壇<White>の存在を、<Veigue>たちは知る。 ハックを助け、<Yellow>聖獣<White>を見つけるために<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>を復活させなくてはならない。
Entry.EnglishText: Hearing what led to Hack's imprisonment, the party learns of the <Blue>Sacred Altar<White>, where the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> is said to dwell. They must save Hack and revive the <Blue>Sacred Bird<White> in order to locate the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖壇<White>に<Red>赤き命の珠<White>を捧げ、燃やせば、<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>がよみがえるという。 <Veigue>たちは<Red>捧げ物<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that if the <Red>Jewel of Life<White> is offered on the <Blue>altar<White> and burned, the <Blue>Sacred Bird<White> will be revived. The party searches for the <Red>offering<White>.
Entry.Notes: The first two characters of 赤き命の珠 means red - they learn that it needs to glow red. However, since the synopsis already says that it needs to be burned, I didn't include it since literally it would mean Red Jewel of Life, which is never stated in the story.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖壇<White>に<Red>アカトゲサボテン<White>が燃える時、<Yellow>聖なる鳥の図<White>、すなわち<Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>の<Yellow>地上絵<White>と同じものが浮かび上がる。
Entry.EnglishText: When a <Red>red-thorned cacti<White> is burned on the <Blue>altar<White>, an <Yellow>image of the Sacred Bird<White> emerges, matching the image that is displayed on the <Yellow>geoglyphs<White> in the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックを救った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: After freeing Hack from prison, <Veigue> and the party head to the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 熱砂に舞う翼
Entry.EnglishText: Wings Over Hot Sand
Entry.Notes: Wings Flying Over Hot Sand

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>に広がる、<Yellow>巨大な地上絵<White>。 そこには、<Yellow>古代の聖火台<White>があった。
Entry.EnglishText: A massive geoglyph stretches across the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>. There they find a <Yellow>Flame Holder<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタの<Blue>聖壇<White>にあった言葉…… <Cyan>「強き心に強き翼を持て」<White>をたよりに、 <Yellow>聖火台<White>に<Red>火<White>を灯していく<Mao>。
Entry.EnglishText: Written on the <Blue>Sacred Altar<White> in Pipista was the following inscription: "<Cyan>A strong heart yields strong wings<White>." <Mao> lit the <Yellow>flame holder<White> using his <Red>fire<White>.
Entry.Notes: Need to check if Mao lights the flame after the party reads the inscription.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>心<White>と<Cyan>翼<White>に紅の炎が燃える時、<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>は羽ばたき、<Yellow>陽炎の荒野<White>に<Red>巨大な塔<White>が姿を現した。 七人は<Yellow>聖獣の待つ塔<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: As the flame burned in the <Cyan>heart<White> and <Cyan>wings<White>, the <Blue>Sacred Bird<White> flapped its wings, revealing a <Red>giant tower<White> within the <Yellow>wasteland's shimmering haze<White>. The seven head for the <Yellow>tower where the Sacred Beast awaits<White>.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if the sacred bird actually flies or it just flaps its wings; need to check the actual scene.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>の思い出
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s Memories
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>にそびえる<Red>焔の塔<White>に来た<Veigue>たちに、<Blue>謎の声<White>が呼びかける。 <Yellow>声の主<White>は試練の始まりを告げた。
Entry.EnglishText: A <Blue>mysterious<White> voice calls out to the party, who have come to the <Red>Burning Tower<White> that emerged from the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>. The voice announces the beginning of the trial.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知恵の迷宮を進む<Mao>は、不思議な光景を見る。
Entry.EnglishText: As <Mao> traverses the Labyrinth of Wisdom, he sees a strange vision.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは、<Red><Mao>の記憶<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: It is <Red>his memories<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: やがて<Mao>は知る。 己が何者なのかを……
Entry.EnglishText: At the end of his memories, <Mao> finds out who he truly is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が<Yellow>聖獣<White>たちによって生み出された、特別な存在である事を。 出生の秘密にとまどいながらも、<Blue>思念浄化<White>への決意を示した<Mao>に、<Red>聖獣フェニア<White>は<Red>炎の力<White>を与える。 <Veigue>たちは次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求め、<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: He realizes he is a special being created by the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White>. Although puzzled upon learning the secret behind his birth, <Mao> remains determined to <Blue>purify the Will<White>, so the <Red>Sacred Beast Fenia<White> grants him the <Red>Power of Flame<White>. The party seeks out the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>, and sets out for the <Cyan>ancient tower which soars above the sea of clouds<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なるもの、忌むべきもの
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred or Abhorent?
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックから<Blue>古の塔<White>の事を聞くために、<Yellow>ピピスタ<White>に戻る<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party return to <Yellow>Pipista<White> to inquire about the <Blue>ancient tower<White> from Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: その頃、ラジルダ近くの<Yellow>アズーラ海岸<White>に、女王アガーテが流れ着いていた…… 七人は<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>にハックを追う。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Queen Agarte washes up on the <Yellow>Azura Coast<White> near Razilda... The party follow Hack to <Yellow>Razilda<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ラジルダ<White>では、ガジュマの住民たちは、<Blue>闇の力<White>を調べようとしたハックを捕らえようとしていた。 七人はハック救出に向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the Gajuma in <Yellow>Razilda<White> were trying to capture Hack, who'd been investigating the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>. They set off to rescue Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>イーフォンの聖殿<White>でハックを救出した<Veigue>たちは、街へ戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: After rescuing Hack at the <Yellow>Shrine of Eephon<White>, <Veigue> and the party return to the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街では種族間の対立が激化していた。 そこへ、<Red>ミルハウスト<White>率いるカレギア軍が現れ、争いを鎮圧する。
Entry.EnglishText: The conflicts between the races starts to intensify, but then the Callegean Army led by <Red>Milhaust<White> steps in and quells the conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、ハックから<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>と思わしき<Blue>幻の庭<White>の情報を得て、<Yellow>キョグエン<White>に向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head for <Yellow>Kyogen<White> after receiving information from Hack on the <Blue>Garden of Illusions<White>, which may be a <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 壁の向こうに
Entry.EnglishText: Beyond the Wall

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>キョグエン<White>で<Blue>古の塔<White>の手がかりを探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for clues on the <Blue>ancient tower<White> in <Yellow>Kyogen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツから、街の富豪<Red>ワン・ギン<White>が情報を持っていると聞き、会いに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon reuniting with Frantz, they learn from him that <Red>Wang Gin<White>, a wealthy man in town, may have information on the matter, so the party decide to visit him.

Entry.JapaneseText: 情報の代わりに、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>オークション<White>の警備をする事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: In exchange for the information, <Veigue> and the party agree to guard the <Yellow>auction<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 接客のため<Veigue>と引き離されたクレアは、監禁されてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is separated from the group to serve as a hostess, but is instead held captive.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで、クレアとアガーテは互いの正体を知る事なく、壁越しに励まし合う。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhlile, Claire and Agarte speak to each other through the walls without realizing the other's identity, encouraging each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな折、<Yellow>オークション会場<White>が盗賊に襲われる。
Entry.EnglishText: Suddenly, bandits attack the <Yellow>auction site<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 六人は、さらわれたクレアを追う。
Entry.EnglishText: The six pursue Claire, who'd been kidnapped.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを助けた<Veigue>たちは、<Blue>古の塔<White>の手がかりが<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>にあると聞き、<Red>北<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: After the rescue, they hear that the next <Blue>clue<White> is in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>. They decide to head <Red>North<White>.
Entry.Notes: Had to shorten this to fit it

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔
Entry.EnglishText: Tower of Nereg
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>で<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party continues their search for the <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White> in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の若者から<Yellow>ネジャナ半島<White>に<Red>ネレグの塔<White>があると聞かされる。
Entry.EnglishText: In town, they learn of the <Red>Tower of Nereg<White> located on the <Yellow>Nejana Peninsula<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ネレグの塔<White>に入った<Veigue>たちは<Blue>謎の声<White>に導かれ、<Yellow>最上階<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party enters the <Yellow>Tower of Nereg<White>, where they are guided by a <Blue>mysterious voice<White> who leads them to the <Yellow>top floor<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 塔を守る三つの番人との戦いに勝利し、屋上へと駆け上がる<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: After triumphing over the three guardians of the tower, <Veigue> and the party head to top.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、最上階で七人を待っていたのは、<Yellow>聖獣<White>ではなく、サレだった。 サレは催眠で<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>を凶暴化させ、<Veigue>たちを襲わせる。 元に戻った<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>は心を入れ替え、人のために戦う事を誓い、去って行く。 その時、<Veigue>たちの遥か前方に<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>が姿を現した。
Entry.EnglishText: However, what awaited them at the top was not the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>, but Saleh, who has brainwashed the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> to attack the party. After returning them to normal, the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> have a change of heart, choosing to fight for others instead, and leave. At that moment, the <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White> is now in view.

Entry.JapaneseText: 命の色
Entry.EnglishText: The Color of Life
Entry.Notes: No fit

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>古の塔<White>がある<Yellow>ベオ平原<White>に行くため、 <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>で船を探す事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: To reach the <Yellow>Beo Plains<White> where the <Blue>ancient tower<White> lies, the party seeks a ship in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、港は閉鎖され、船は出ない。
Entry.EnglishText: Sadly, the port's closed and ships are unavailable.

Entry.JapaneseText: 七人は、軍の要請で<White>ノルゼン<White>に来ていた<Red>女医・キュリア<White>に相談する。
Entry.EnglishText: The party consults with <Red>Doctor<White> Curia, who had come to <Yellow>Nolzen<White> at the military's request.

Entry.JapaneseText: その矢先にバイラスが街を襲い、多くの兵士が傷つき、街は野戦病院と化す。
Entry.EnglishText: At that moment, a horde of Biruses attack the city, wounding several soldiers. The city is abruptly transformed into a field hospital.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、<Annie>はガジュマの兵士の治療を拒絶し、その兵士は絶命する。 兵士の命、涙する<Eugene>の姿に、<Annie>は<Cyan>「命に色はない」<White>という言葉の意味を知る。
Entry.EnglishText: However, <Annie> refuses to treat a Gajuma soldier, and he ends up perishing. With the loss of the soldier's life and <Eugene>'s tears, <Annie> finally understands the meaning behind the words "<Cyan>Life knows no color<White>."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>は、仲間の助けを得て、兵士たちの治療にあたる。
Entry.EnglishText: With the support of her friends, <Annie> is able to treat injured soldiers.

Entry.JapaneseText: ようやく船を得た<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ベオ平原<White>にそびえる<Blue>古の塔<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Having finally obtained a ship, the party head for the <Blue>Ancient Tower<White>, which lies in the <Yellow>Beo Plains<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の真実
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>'s Truth

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>古の塔<White>で<Veigue>たちを待っていたのは、<Red>聖獣ウォンティガ<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: Awaiting <Veigue> and the party in the <Blue>Ancient Tower<White> is the <Red>Sacred Beast Wontiga<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>ドクター・バース殺害事件<White>の光景を 見せられた<Annie>の心は揺れる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>'s heart is shaken when she is shown the truth of <Cyan>Dr. Barr's murder<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父バースが犯した国王暗殺の大罪、<Eugene>がバースを殺した現実、バースをかばうために、すべてを失った<Eugene>の苦しみ…… つらく重い事実を突きつけられながらも<Annie>は種族の共存を強く願い、ウォンティガから<Blue>風の力<White>を授かる。 その時、<Red>聖獣シャオルーン<White>が割り込み、<Veigue>に呼びかける。 <Cyan>「急がないと大切なものを失う」<White> というシャオルーンの言葉を受け、 七人は<Yellow>ベルサス<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: She learns that Dr. Barrs committed regicide by assassinating the king and that <Eugene> did indeed kill Barrs and sacrificed everyting to protect Barrs's reputation. Although <Annie> is confronted with this painful truth, she confirms her desire for the coexistence of the two races and receives the <Blue>Power of Wind<White> from Wontiga. Suddenly, <Red>the Sacred Beast Shaorune<White> interjects and warns <Veigue> with these foreboding words: "You'll lose something precious to you!" Heeding Shaorune's warning, the seven head to <Yellow>Belsas<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスの日
Entry.EnglishText: That Day in Belsas
Entry.Notes: Not sure if this is a significant moment and term used in the game

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ベルサス<White>に着いた<Veigue>たちは、<Cyan>「大切なもの」<White>が何なのかを探る。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon the party's arrival at <Yellow>Belsas<White>, they try to find out what this "precious" thing could be.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一方、アガーテは<Yellow>ベルサス<White>がヒューマによるガジュマ差別がはびこる街だと知る。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Agarte learns that <Yellow>Belsas<White> is rife with discrimination against the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテはガジュマの窮状を救うべく、街の権力者<Red>スカラベ<White>との交渉に向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: She heads out to negotiate with the leader of the city, <Red>Scarabe<White>, in order to save the Gajuma from their plight.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの反抗に怒ったスカラベは、<Cyan>アガーテの処刑<White>を行おうとする。 処刑台のアガーテは人々に訴える。 <Cyan>「心に種族はない」<White>と…… クレアとアガーテの<Yellow>入れ替わり<White>に気づいた<Veigue>は<Red>クレア<White>を救う。 だが、<Red>アガーテ<White>は逃亡する。
Entry.EnglishText: Angered by the Gajuma's protest, Scarabe attempts to <Cyan>execute Agarte<White>. At the execution site, she appeals to the people with these words "that our hearts have no such thing as race." Realizing that Claire and Agarte had swapped bodies, <Veigue> saves Claire. However, Agarte ends up fleeing.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを元に戻せないまま、七人は シャオルーンの待つ<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Unable to restore Claire to her true body, they head to <Yellow>Babilograd<White>, where Shaorune awaits.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣シャオルーン！
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred Beast Shaorune!
Entry.Notes: squish

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>シャオルーン<White>を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party seek out <Yellow>Shaorune<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>蒼の聖殿<White>の地下遺跡に入った<Veigue>に、シャオルーンは<Red>三つの試練<White>を課すと告げた。 <Red>第一の試練<White>は、<Cyan>シャオルーンのもとへ行く事<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon entering the underground ruins in the <Blue>Azure Sanctuary<White>, Shaorune informs <Veigue> that he must undergo <Red>three trials<White>. The first trial is to <Cyan>find Shaorune<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーンの見せる幻影を振り切り、最深部にたどり着いた<Veigue>は、 <Red>第二の試練<White>……<Cyan>聖獣との戦い<White>に挑む。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon overcoming the various illusions conjured by Shaorune, <Veigue> is able to reach the depths of the sanctuary. The <Red>second trial<White> is a <Cyan>battle against the sacred beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>最後の試練<White>……<Cyan>シャオルーンの質問<White>に答えた<Veigue>は<Blue>水の力<White>を得る。 シャオルーンは<Veigue>たちと共に行くと言い残し、大空へはばたく。
Entry.EnglishText: For the <Red>final trial<White>... <Veigue> answers Shaorune's question and obtains the <Blue>Power of Water<White>. Shaorune declares his intention to travel along with the party and takes them to the skies.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは次の<Yellow>聖獣<White>の言葉を受け、<Hilda>の出自を探るため、<Yellow>ハーフの村<White>の手がかりを求め、<Yellow>東大陸<White>に<Yellow>フランツ<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party follows the words of the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White> and set out to find <Hilda>'s origins. They consult Frantz on the eastern continent to find clues on the rumored <Yellow>village filled with Halfs<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 愛する者へ
Entry.EnglishText: Dearly Beloved
Entry.Notes: could also translate to "To the one I love"

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>と同じ<Yellow>タロット<White>を持つという<Red>占い師<White>に会うため、<Yellow>モクラド村<White>に向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head over to <Yellow>Mocrado Village<White> to meet a fortune teller who carries the same <Yellow>tarot cards<White> as <Hilda>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 占い師<Red>ナイラ<White>は<Hilda>の母だった。 だがナイラは<Hilda>を拒絶する。
Entry.EnglishText: As it turns out, the fortune teller was actually <Hilda>'s own mother, <Red>Nayla<White>. However, she ends up rejecting her own daughter.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんとかナイラと話をしようとする<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: Despite her intial pushback, <Veigue> and the others manage to get Nayla to open up.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこにトーマが現れ、襲いかかる。 ナイラは<Hilda>をかばって、命を落とす……
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma then appears and attacks them. Nayla takes a blow meant for <Hilda> and is killed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自らの死を予期し、ナイラが残した <Yellow>手紙<White>に、両親の大きな愛を感じ、<Hilda>は涙する。
Entry.EnglishText: Having foreseen her own death, Nayla left behind a <Yellow>letter<White> for <Hilda>. <Hilda> weeps as she learns of the love her parents had for her.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ナイラの遺品<White>から見つかった<Purple>紫水晶<White>を手がかりに、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈近くの島<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: Using the <Purple>crystal<White> left behind in <Yellow>Nayla's belongings<White> as a clue, <Veigue> and the party set out for an <Yellow>island at the foot of the Alvan Mountains<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>が生まれた日
Entry.EnglishText: The Day <Hilda> was Born
Entry.Notes: squish

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ギリオーヌ<White>の<Yellow>試練<White>に挑む<Hilda>。
Entry.EnglishText: <Red>Gilione<White> has <Hilda> undergo his trial.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖獣<White>は<Hilda>に過去を見せる。 <Hilda>が生まれた日の両親の喜び。 ハーフとして差別を受けた心の傷。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White> shows <Hilda> her past, the joy her parents experienced the day she was born, the heartbreak of being discriminated against as a Half...

Entry.JapaneseText: 父<Red>アムジル<White>の死、ナイラとの別れ。 悲しき初恋の終わり…… 改めて、<Yellow>ハーフ<White>である我が身を思い知らされた<Hilda>の心は揺れる。
Entry.EnglishText: ...the death of her father, <Red>Amzil<White>, his farewell to Nayla, and the sorrowful end of <Hilda>'s first love. <Hilda>'s heart is shaken as she is reminded once again that she is a Half.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>純粋なヒトの身体<White>を与えるという<Yellow>聖獣<White>に、<Hilda>はひとりの<Yellow>ヒト<White>として両親に与えられたこの身体こそが、自分の<Red>誇り<White>なのだと告げる。 自らの存在を受け入れ、心を解放した時、<Hilda>は<Purple>光の力<White>を得る。 そして、<Veigue>たちは最後の<Red>聖獣ランドグリーズ<White>を求め、旅立つ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Sacred Beast offers to give her a <Yellow>pure body<White>, but <Hilda> proclaims she is a <Yellow>Human<White> and her body, given to her by her parents, is now her <Red>pride<White>. With the acceptance of her unique existence, <Hilda>'s heart is burdened no longer and she is able to gain the <Purple>Power of Light<White>. <Veigue> and the party then sets off to find the final <Red>Sacred Beast, Randgriz<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻を求めて
Entry.EnglishText: Searching for the Illusion
Entry.Notes: squish

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖獣<White>ランドグリーズの手がかりとなる<Blue>幻の島<White>を探し、<Veigue>たちは世界を駆けめぐる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party travel the world in search of the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>, which holds clues to the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White> Randgriz.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ベルサス<White>の若者<Red>マウロ<White>の話から、<Red>伝説の海賊アイフリード<White>の宝と<Blue>幻の島<White>に関係があると考えた<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>バルカ島<White>の<Yellow>北の海<White>で宝を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: Following <Red>Mauro<White>'s map, a young man in Belsas, <Veigue> and the party search for the hidden treasure on the seas north of Balka. They believe that the treasure of the <Red>legendary Pirate King Aifread<White> and the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White> could be connected.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊の宝箱から出て来た<Purple>古い地図<White>に、違和感を感じる<Hilda>。 地図を調べると、<Cyan>サニイタウンが描かれていない<White>事がわかる。 <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>に<Blue>幻の島<White>の手がかりを求め、向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda> notices something is wrong with the <Purple>ancient map<White> they obtained from the pirate's treasure chest. Upon further investigation of the map, the party discovers that <Cyan>Sunnytown is not drawn on it<White>. <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White> in the hopes of finding more clues to the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の絆
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>'s Bonds
Entry.Notes: I feel like there could be a better way to phrase this title.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>サニイタウン<White>が<Blue>幻の島<White>だと知った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ランドグリーズの聖殿<White>へと導かれる。
Entry.EnglishText: After the party discovers that the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White> is actually in <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>, they are brought to the <Yellow>Ruins of Randgriz<White>.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if it should be holy temple instead of ruins;

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>はランドグリーズそのもので、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>は<Cyan>ランドグリーズの背中の上にできた街<White>だと、<Yellow>聖獣<White>は語る。 そして、<Yellow>聖獣<White>は<Eugene>に試練を課す。
Entry.EnglishText: The Sacred Beast informs them that the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White> is Randgriz himself and that Sunnytown is actually just a city created on his back. He then challenges <Eugene> to pass his trial.

Entry.JapaneseText: 己の心に潜む光と影に直面させられても、揺るがない決意を示した<Eugene>に、ランドグリーズは<Blue>地の力<White>を与える。 ついにすべての<Red>聖獣の力<White>が集まった。
Entry.EnglishText: Randgriz grants <Eugene> the Power of Earth after he displays an unwavering determination confronting the shadows in his heart. With this, all the <Red>Powers of the Sacred Beasts<White> have been gathered.

Entry.JapaneseText: 浄化
Entry.EnglishText: Purification
Entry.Notes: squish

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>聖獣の力<White>で、<Yellow>思念<White>を<Yellow>浄化<White>する。 人々に取りついていた<Yellow>思念<White>は消える。 使命を終えた<Yellow>聖獣<White>たちは去って行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party <Yellow>purify<White> the <Yellow>Will<White> using the <Yellow>Power of the Sacred Beasts<White>. The Will that had possessed the people disappeared. Having completed their mission, the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White> take their leave.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if "possessed" is the right word to use here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>は、ようやく自分の正体を仲間たちに告げ、迷う心を伝える。 <Cyan>「おまえはおまえだ」<White>という<Veigue>の言葉に<Mao>は救われる。 その時、街で争いが起こった。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao> finally reveals to his friends his true identity and shares his doubts with them, but he is reassured with <Veigue>'s simple words, "You're you." At that moment, a fight breaks out in the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへシャオルーンが戻って来て、各地で争いが起こり始めていると告げる。
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune returns to the party and informs them that conflicts are erupting all over the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>思念<White>は浄化されたが、<Red>人々の憎しみ<White>は高まり、<Yellow>ヒトの心<White>が作る<Red>負の感情<White>が、世界を覆い始めているという。 <Veigue>たちは争いを止めるために、再び旅に出る。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Will<White> has been purified, but the <Red>people's hatred<White> is growing and the <Red>negative emotions<White> from their <Yellow>hearts<White> have begun enveloping the world. <Veigue> and the party set out once more to stop the conflicts.

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和のために
Entry.EnglishText: Working Towards Peace

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、紛争を解決し、この異常事態を収めるために、シャオルーンと共に<Yellow>世界中を駆けめぐる<White>。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party travel the world with Shaorune to resolve the various conflicts and put an end to this anomaly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 同族の争い
Entry.EnglishText: Racial Infighting

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ピピスタ<White>を訪れた<Veigue>たちは、村の様子がおかしい事に気づく。 ガジュマだけが暮らす<Yellow>ピピスタ<White>では、同種族の間にも<Red>階級差<White>が作られていた。 その矢先、二人の子供が行方不明になり、住民たちが争い始める。 <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>へ子供たちを探しに行く。 <Veigue>たちは、子供たちを連れて村へ戻るが、大人たちの争いは続く。 角や毛皮、翼という<Yellow>容姿の違い<White>を理由に友だち<Red>トッポ<White>との交流を禁じられた少女<Red>レイ<White>は、自らの翼を切り落とそうとする。 その姿に大人たちは反省するのだった。 <Veigue>の心にも<Yellow>種族<White>という言葉が重くのしかかっていた……
Entry.EnglishText: As the party enters <Yellow>Pipista<White>, they notice something strange has happened. Even though only Gajuma live here, they have created <Red>class distinctions<White> even amongst themselves. It is then that two children go missing, and the residents begin to quarrel. The party heads to the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White> to look for the children. They return with the children in tow, but the adults continue their bickering. Forbidden from interacting with her friend <Red>Topp<White> just because of differences in their appearance, <Red>Rei<White> tries to cut off her own wings. After witnessing this, the adults are remorseful that their actions pushed her to this. <Veigue> himself is also left contemplating the concept of <Yellow>race<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: やさしさは種族を越えて
Entry.EnglishText: Kindness Transcends Race
Entry.Notes: A Kindness that Transcends Race

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>アニカマル<White>に来た<Veigue>たちは、村が殺気立っている事に気づく。 調べると、多数派のガジュマが少数派のヒューマを追い出してしまったとわかる。 ヒューマは<Yellow>バイラスの巣窟<White>になっている<Yellow>オアシス<White>に行ったという。 <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>オアシス<White>に向かう。 バイラスに襲われていたヒューマたちを救い、村へ戻る<Veigue>たち。 村では、バイラスの襲撃を受けたガジュマたちが逃げ惑っていた。 七人は、ヒューマたちと共にガジュマを助ける。 人々は、今までずっと<Red>ご近所さん<White>として協力して来た事を思い出す。
Entry.EnglishText: When the party enters the village of <Yellow>Anikamal<White>, they find that the villagers are filled with murderous intent. Upon investigation, they find that the majority group, the Gajuma, have driven out the minority group, the Huma. Expelled from their homes, the Huma were driven to the <Yellow>oasis<White>, where the Biruses have made their nest. The party chases after them to the <Yellow>oasis<White>. They return to the village after rescuing the Huma who were attacked by the Biruses, but find Gajuma fleeing after being attacked by Biruses. The seven rescue the Gajuma together with the Huma, showing the villagers they can cooperate and live together as <Red>neighbors<White> from now on.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if it should be "murderous intent" or maybe along the lines of "violent mood"

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスとヒト
Entry.EnglishText: Biruses and Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バビログラード<White>では、<Yellow>蒼の聖殿<White>の<Red>祭司の座<White>をめぐり、種族間の争いが起きていた。 リフトを止め山頂側を占拠したヒューマと、港側に追いやられたガジュマ。 街は分断されていた。 封鎖された<Yellow>登山洞<White>を突破し、山頂の街へ向かう<Veigue>たち。 そこに<Red>祭司<White>の命を狙うガジュマが現れ、祭司はシャオルーンの聖殿へと逃げる。 <Veigue>たちは祭司を救い出すが、地上に出たバイラスが人々を襲う。 人々は協力してバイラスを倒し、かつての共存関係を思い出す。 ひとまず争いは収まった。 だが、<Cyan><Veigue>の苦悩<White>は<Red>限界<White>に達しようとしていた……
Entry.EnglishText: In <Yellow>Babilograd<White>, there was a dispute over which race would occupy the <Red>position of priest<White> for the <Yellow>Azure Sanctuary<White>. The Huma halted the lift operations and took over the summit while the Gajuma were forced to the port side, a situation which divided the town. The party breaks through the blockade at <Yellow>Climber's Cavern<White> and heads to the summit. A Gajuma shows up seeking the life of the priest and forces him to flee to Shaorune's temple. The party is able to rescue the priest, but then a Birus emerges from the ground and attack the people. They are able to cooperate to defeat the Birus, remembering how they originally lived a life of coexistence. The conflict is over for the time being, but <Cyan><Veigue>'s anguish<White> is about to hit its <Red>limit<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテの旅
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte's Journey

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちが、各地で人々の争いを止めようと奔走していた頃、アガーテもひとり、孤独な旅を続けていた。 <Yellow>首都バルカ<White>から<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>、そして<Red>ミナール<White>へ。 自らが引き起こした対立を止めるため、 奮闘するアガーテの姿に、人々は少しずつ変わり始めていた。 アガーテ自身も、<Yellow>大切な何か<White>に気づき始めていた……
Entry.EnglishText: While <Veigue> and the party were busy stopping conflicts all over the country, Agarte was on her own journey, traveling from <Yellow>Balka<White>, the capital of <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>, to <Red>Minal<White>. As Agarte struggled to stop the conflicts she herself had caused, the people began to change, little by little. And she too began to realize <Yellow>something important<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>の涙
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>'s Tears

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミナール<White>でも種族の対立は続いていた。
Entry.EnglishText: In <Yellow>Minal<White>, the conflict between the two races continues.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな中、<Cyan>アガーテの目撃情報<White>を聞いた<Veigue>は、クレアを元に戻すため必死でアガーテを探す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> learns that <Cyan>Agarte<White> had been sighted and desperately searches for her so that Claire can be returned to her original body.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、アガーテは見つからず、苦悩する<Veigue>のフォルスは<Red>暴走<White>を始めた。
Entry.EnglishText: However, he is unable to find her, and his distress causes his Force to go <Red>berserk<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 原因が自分だと悟ったクレアは去る。 <Veigue>は単身、<Yellow>クレアを追う<White>。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire realizes that she is the cause of his distress and leaves the party. Alone, <Yellow>Veigue<White> chases after her.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミルハウスト<White>に敗れ、絶望する<Veigue>の前にアガーテが現れる。
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte then appears before <Veigue>, who is in despair after he suffers a defeat from <Yellow>Milhaust<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は、自分を見失った<Veigue>を<Yellow>海岸<White>に呼び出す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> tells <Veigue> to meet him at the <Yellow>beach<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 力尽きるまで拳と拳をぶつけ合う二人。 ようやく心の内を語る<Veigue>と見守る仲間たちを、夕陽が照らす。
Entry.EnglishText: The two have a fistfight until both exhaust themselves. <Veigue> finally speaks his mind to his friends as the setting sun shines on them.
Entry.Notes: not sure how to write that second sentence - setting sun or maybe dusk?

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズへ
Entry.EnglishText: To Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>スールズ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head back to <Yellow>Sulz<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズに戻った<Veigue>は、自分の迷いや疑問を<Red>マルコ<White>らにぶつける。 <Red>ラキヤ<White>の勧めもあって、<Veigue>は村を見て回る。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon his return, <Veigue> consults with <Red>Marco<White> and his wife about the hesitations and doubts he harbors. Listening to <Red>Rakia<White>'s advice, he takes a walk around the village.

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラは<Veigue>の励ましに応え、<Purple>ピーチパイ<White>を片手に姿を現す。 村人の和解のきっかけ作りに、<Purple>ピーチパイ<White>を焼いて、<Yellow>パーティー<White>を開く事になり、<Veigue>とアガーテは、村人たちに声をかけて回る。
Entry.EnglishText: Poplar responds to <Veigue>'s encouragement, bringing her famous <Purple>Peach Pie<White> in hand. Seeking to reconcile the villagers, <Veigue> and <Agarte> ask all of them to join the <Yellow>party<White> and create an opportunity to patch things up.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>集会所<White>に人々が集まり、ようやく以前の楽しさが戻り始めた時、<Veigue>の迷いは消え、<Yellow>本当に大切なもの<White>に気づく。
Entry.EnglishText: With the villagers gathering together at the <Yellow>meeting house<White>, the mood of the village returns to the joyful times of the past. <Veigue> realizes <Yellow>what is truly important<White> and his hesitation is disolved.
Entry.Notes: I think there's a better way to phrase the first sentence

Entry.JapaneseText: 立ち直った<Veigue>は、仲間たちと共に、再び旅立つ。
Entry.EnglishText: Having regained his resolve, <Veigue> sets out once again, together with his comrades.

Entry.JapaneseText: 崩壊
Entry.EnglishText: The Collapse

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>世界の異変<White>を告げる<White>不気味な地鳴り<White>が、大空に響き渡る。 <Veigue>たちはシャオルーンと共に、<Yellow>地鳴りの発信源<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: An eerie rumbling signals the <Red>strange anomolies<White> in the world. The party works together with Shaorune to find the <Yellow>source of this rumbling<White>.
Entry.Notes: I need more context on how this scene plays out

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ラジルダ上空<White>に差しかかった時、大地は悲鳴を上げ、<Yellow>ラジルダの街<White>は崩壊し、海の底へと沈んだ。 この<Red>大災害の原因<White>を尋ねるべく、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ランドグリーズ<White>のもとへ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: When they arrive at Razilda, the earth cries out, and the city is destroyed, sinking to the bottom of the sea. <Veigue> and the party head to Randgriz to inquire about the cause of this catastrophe.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最後の賭け
Entry.EnglishText: The Final Gamble

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖獣<White>たちは、<Red>異変の原因<White>は<Yellow>ヒトの心<White>が生み出した<Blue>負の感情<White>にあると告げる。 <Yellow>思念<White>は<Yellow>浄化<White>されたが、<Yellow>ヒトの心<White>の中に潜んでいた憎しみや対立感情が表面化し、悪の力となって世界を覆っている。 このまま<Blue>負の感情<White>が高まり、臨界に達すれば、恐ろしい大災害が起こる。 それを阻止する方法は<Red>ゲオルギアスの復活<White>以外になかった。 だが、<Yellow>聖獣王<White>が復活すればヒューマは滅ぼされてしまうかもしれない。 それでも<Veigue>たちは、ゲオルギアスを復活させ、説得を試みる事に望みを託す。 ……それは、<Yellow>最後の賭け<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White> inform the party that the <Red>cause of the calamity<White> are the <Blue>negative emotions<White> created by <Yellow>Human hearts<White>. Although the <Yellow>Will<White> was <Yellow>purified<White>, the hatred and antagonism lurking in the <Yellow>Human heart<White> have surfaced and become an evil power covering the world. If these <Blue>negative emotions<White> continue to grow and hit critical mass, a calamity will occur. The only way to stop it is by reviving <Red>Geyorkias<White>. However, the <Yellow>Sacred Beast King<White>'s revival may mean the destruction of all Huma. Still, the party pin their hopes on Geyorkias's revival and plan to persuade him... This is their <Yellow>final gamble<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 死闘
Entry.EnglishText: Battle to the Death

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ゲオルギアスの骸<White>が眠るという<Yellow>獣王山の遺跡<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to the <Yellow>ruins in Mount Sovereign<White>, where Geyorkias's body lays.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>獣王山<White>の入口では、サレたち<Blue>四星<White>が待ち受けていた。
Entry.EnglishText: At the entrance of Mount Sovereign are the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. Saleh and his cohorts have been waiting for the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: 勢ぞろいした<Blue>四星<White>との死闘に打ち勝った<Veigue>たち。 ワルトゥは<Eugene>の説得に応じ剣を捨て、ミリッツァは<Hilda>の言葉に自分の生きる道を考え始める。 サレとトーマは、最期まで種族の共存を笑い続け、死亡する。 そして、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>獣王山<White>にある<Red>王家の聖所<White>に突入する。
Entry.EnglishText: The party triumphs over the <Blue>Four Stars<White> in battle. <Eugene> persuades Walto to lay down his arms, and Militsa reconsiders her path in life after listening to <Hilda>'s words. Saleh and Tohma continue to scoff at the idea of coexistence between races until the end, and both meet their demise. The party then enters the <Red>Royal Sactuary<White> on <Yellow>Mount Sovereign<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 決着
Entry.EnglishText: The Conclusion

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>王家の聖所<White>に仕掛けられた数々の罠や関門に挑みながら、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>最上階<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party aims to reach the <Yellow>top floor<White> of the <Yellow>Royal Sanctuary<White>, navigating through the various traps and barriers that were laid.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖獣王復活<White>を急ぐ七人の前に、<Yellow>ミルハウスト<White>が立ちはだかる。 己の信念と誇りを賭け、<Veigue>とミルハウストの一騎打ちが始まる。
Entry.EnglishText: But <Yellow>Milhaust<White> bars the way of the seven who are determined to revive the <Yellow>Sacred Beast King<White>. <Veigue> duels Milhaust, with their beliefs and honor on the line.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦いに勝利した<Veigue>の前に、<Yellow>クレア<White>が現れる。 二人は互いの想いを理解し合い、これからは共に歩む事を誓う。 <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ゲオルギアスの骸<White>が眠る<Yellow>王家の聖所<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: After <Veigue> emerges victorious, <Yellow>Claire<White> appears before him. The two vow to walk hand in hand, now understanding each other's feelings. The party heads to the <Yellow>Royal Sanctuary<White>, where <Yellow>Geyorkias's carcass<White> lies.

Entry.JapaneseText: 黒幕
Entry.EnglishText: Mastermind

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ゲオルギアス<White>の身体が眠る<Yellow>王家の聖所<White>で<Veigue>たちを待っていたのは、アガーテの侍従・<Red>ジルバ<White>だった。 ジルバは、<Red>ラドラス王<White>の暗殺に始まるすべての事件の黒幕が自分だと告げ、驚く<Veigue>たちをあざ笑う。 <Yellow>聖獣王の力<White>を賭けて、ジルバと<Veigue>たちの戦いが始まる。
Entry.EnglishText: Awaiting the party at the <Yellow>Royal Sanctuary<White> where Geyorkias's body lies is Zilva, Agarte's personal aide. She admits that she is the mastermind behind all the events, starting with the assassination of <Red>King Ladras<White>, and mocks the party. The battle between Zilva and <Veigue> begins, as they vie over the <Yellow>Sacred Beast King's power<White>.
Entry.Notes: technically should be Power of the King of the Sacred Beasts, but that was far too wordy and has too many prepositions.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバを倒した<Veigue>たちは、ゲオルギアスを復活させ、説得を試みる。 だが、その時、<Yellow>負の感情<White>は頂点に達し、<Red>破滅のもの・ユリス<White>が誕生してしまう。 ゲオルギアスはユリスに倒され、<Yellow>獣王山上空<White>に、<Red>ユリスの領域<White>が発生する。 <Veigue>たちは、暗黒の渦巻く空へと向かう……
Entry.EnglishText: After defeating Zilva, the party revive Geyorkias and try to persuade him. However, the <Yellow>negative emotions<White> have reached their critical mass, and <Red>the Beast of Calamity<White>, Yuris, is born. Geyorkias is defeated by Yuris, and <Red>Yuris's Realm<White> takes form above <Yellow>Mount Sovereign<White>. <Veigue> and the party head towards the whirlpool of darkness in the sky.

Entry.JapaneseText: 心の力
Entry.EnglishText: The Power of the Heart

Entry.JapaneseText: 覚悟を決め、<Yellow>ユリスの領域<White>に突入した<Veigue>たちは、最深部へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Resolving themselves, <Veigue> and the party enter Yuris's realm and head to the innermost depths.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、そこは<Blue>負の感情<White>に満ちた<Yellow>邪悪な空間<White>だった。 <Veigue>たちの心は影響を受け、みるみる力が奪い取られていく。
Entry.EnglishText: It is an <Yellow>evil space<White> teeming with <Blue>negative emotions<White>. Their spirits are affected and their power is drained.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if "spirits" is the correct word

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>負の感情<White>に冒されくじけそうになった<Veigue>たちを、<Red>暖かな光<White>が包む。
Entry.EnglishText: In the midst of their affliction from the <Blue>negative emotions<White> and on the verge of despair, the party is enveloped by a <Red>warm light<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは、<Yellow>世界の人々<White>の<Red>心の力<White>だった。 破滅の危機に直面し、手を取り合う事の大切さに気づいた人々の<Yellow>心の力<White>が集まり<Veigue>たちを後押しする。
Entry.EnglishText: It is the <Red>power of the heart<White> from <Yellow>people all over the world<White>. Faced with destruction, the people realized the importance of working hand in hand. The <Yellow>power of their hearts<White> join together, supporting <Veigue> and the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: その力と共に、<Veigue>たちはユリスとの<Yellow>最後の決戦<White>に挑む。
Entry.EnglishText: With their power, <Veigue> and the party face their <Yellow>final battle<White> against Yuris.

Entry.JapaneseText: 希望
Entry.EnglishText: Hope

Entry.JapaneseText: 壮絶な死闘の末に、<Veigue>たちは<Blue>破滅のもの・ユリス<White>を倒した。
Entry.EnglishText: After an intense battle to the death, <Veigue> and the party emerge triumphant over <Blue>Yuris, the Beast of Calamity<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>聖獣<White>と力を合わせ、 ユリスの完全消滅を試みるが、傷ついたゲオルギアスの力は完全ではない。 世界を救いたいと願う、アガーテの強い想いが、<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>をよみがえらせる。 クレアとアガーテは元の身体に戻り、<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>で<Yellow>聖獣王の力<White>を得たアガーテは命をかけてユリスを消し去る。 この戦いを通じて、<Yellow>ヒトの可能性<White>を 感じた<Yellow>聖獣たち<White>は世界を<Yellow>ヒト<White>に委ね、地上より去る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party join forces with the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White> to annihilate Yuris, but lack the complete power of Geyorkias. Agarte's strong desire to save the world is able to restore her <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>. Claire and Agarte return to their original bodies, and Agarte obtains the <Yellow>Power of the Sacred Beast King<White>, and sacrifices her life to defeat Yuris. With this battle, the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White> have realized the <Yellow>potential of Mankind<White> and entrust the world to them, taking their leave from the land.

Entry.JapaneseText: 再誕、そして旅立ち……
Entry.EnglishText: Rebirth and Departure

Entry.JapaneseText:
すべての力を使い果たしたアガーテは、 ミルハウストに想いを告げ、彼の胸の中で永眠する。
ユリスの脅威は消え、危機は去った。 だが、人々の争いは続いている…… それを乗り越え、<Cyan>人々も国も生まれ変わる<White>……<Red>再誕<White>するため、 <Veigue>たちは新たな旅に出る。
それから<Yellow>数年後<White>…… <Cyan>再誕の旅<White>を終えた<Veigue>たちは、 それぞれの道を歩み始める。
「Ｔａｌｅｓ ｏｆ Ｒｅｂｉｒｔｈ」 ＦＩＮ
Entry.EnglishText:
Agarte, having exhausted her powers, confesses her feelings for Milhaust and falls into an eternal slumber in his arms.
The threat of Yuris is gone and the crisis is over, but the struggle amongst the people continues... In order to overcome this struggle, the <Cyan>people and the country<White> will need a <Red>Rebirth<White>. <Veigue> and the party set out once more on a new journey.
<Yellow>Several years later<White>... After completing their <Cyan>journey of Rebirth<White>, they each begin to walk their own path.
Tales of Rebirth FIN
